simplified: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量

pronunciation.pinyin: rén bù kě mào xiàng , hǎi shuǐ bù kě dǒu liáng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ren2 bu4 ke3 mao4 xiang4 , hai3 shui3 bu4 ke3 dou3 liang2

details.simplified: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量
details.traditional: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量

meanings.value: you can't judge a person by appearance, just as you can't measure the sea with a pint pot
